definition: devils/refers to 日本鬼子, wartime term insult for Japanese
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
foreign devil/term of abuse for Westerners
(derog.) wannabe foreigner, a Chinese person who apes the ways of foreigners
Japanese devil (common term of abuse in wartime China and in subsequent writing)
foreign devil/wartime term of abuse for Japanese

sentences.english: Today, my grandpa who is staying with us mistook me for a Japanese soldier and started to hit me with a bat.
sentences.chinese: 今天来家里住的爷爷把我当成了日本鬼子用球棒打我。

sentences.english: Japanese troops in pursuit of Xue Chai, rescued by a masked man.
sentences.chinese: 鬼子部队来追击薛钗，被蒙面人救下了。

sentences.english: White people were pointed at in the street and called "foreign devil".
sentences.chinese: 白种人走在街上都会被指着骂“洋鬼子”。

sentences.english: It was in 1937 when Japanese soldiers broke into the city Beiping.
sentences.chinese: 日本鬼子闯入北平城是在一九三七年。

sentences.english: And the devil still around in search of their home net.
sentences.chinese: 而鬼子依然四处在搜寻家中漏网者。

sentences.english: When a company commander in the report the situation to huang feng died under the sniper rifle of the devil.
sentences.chinese: 一连长在向黄鸣锋汇报战况时死在了鬼子的狙击枪下。

sentences.english: You helped the Japanese rob us of cotton.
sentences.chinese: 你还帮日本鬼子抢咱们的棉花。

sentences.english: I don't have anything against the Japs and the Chinks.
sentences.chinese: 我并不反对日本鬼子和中国佬。

sentences.english: By the little boy's father, appearing right behind the Jap !
sentences.chinese: 那小男孩儿的父亲，就站在那日本鬼子的后面。

sentences.english: Those producers are tricky mini devils.
sentences.chinese: 这些生产者是棘手的小鬼子。

sentences.english: Dig through tunnel buried explosives would devil ones.
sentences.chinese: 提出挖通地道埋炸药将鬼子一锅端了。

sentences.english: Good heavens, the impish son is falling this time.
sentences.chinese: 天啊，小鬼子这次是要栽跟头了。

sentences.english: The Null Void ability will decloak stealthed Ghosts in the area of effect.
sentences.chinese: 否决真空技能可以使鬼子在这片区域解除隐形。

sentences.english: Wang Jinbiao said that foreign to the devil, we called traitors.
sentences.chinese: 王金彪说外国来的叫鬼子，我们叫汉奸。

sentences.english: At this time, the Wuchang holding a submachinegun seized from the devil body joined the battle.
sentences.chinese: 此时，那五常抱着从鬼子身上缴获的冲锋枪加入战斗。

definition: Japanese devil (common term of abuse in wartime China and in subsequent writing)
to open fire/to shoot a gun
(coll.) Arisaka Type 38 rifle (Japanese army rifle used 1905-1945)
